misc.apogee.min_value: This modifier cannot reduce this below %s
misc.apogee.max_value: This modifier cannot increase this above %s
misc.apogee.mainhand: R-Click with Item in Main Hand
misc.apogee.banned: Cannot be used on a Spawner
stat.apogee.min_delay.desc: The minimum number of ticks between spawns
stat.apogee.max_delay.desc: The maximum number of ticks between spawns
stat.apogee.spawn_count.desc: The number of entities spawned at once
stat.apogee.max_nearby_entities.desc: The total number of entities allowed nearby
stat.apogee.req_player_range.desc: How far a player can be before spawning stops
stat.apogee.spawn_range.desc: The radius (in blocks) that mobs can spawn in
stat.apogee.ignore_players.desc: The spawner does not need a nearby player
stat.apogee.redstone_control.desc: The spawner requires redstone to activate
stat.apogee.no_ai.desc: Spawned entities will have no AI
